name: SaaS Starter Kit (Web) - Clerk + MongoDB + Stripe
description: Kickstart your SaaS web app with Clerk authentication, MongoDB, and Stripe integration.
longDescription: This SaaS starter kit is the perfect foundation for launching a subscription-based web application. Built with Next.js, Clerk for authentication, MongoDB for flexible database storage, and Stripe for subscription billing, this kit provides a complete and scalable architecture out of the box.
features: Fully responsive UI with Tailwind CSS

name: SaaS Starter Kit (Web) - Supabase + Stripe
description: Full-stack SaaS boilerplate with Supabase authentication, Supabase DB, and Stripe.
longDescription: This web-based SaaS starter kit combines the power of Next.js, Supabase for both auth and database, and Stripe for monetization. Ideal for launching products quickly with minimal setup and powerful features.

name: SaaS Starter Kit (Mobile) - React Native + Supabase
description: Mobile SaaS boilerplate using React Native Expo with Supabase and a Node.js backend.
longDescription: This mobile-focused SaaS starter kit uses React Native Expo for frontend, Supabase for auth and storage, and a Node.js + Express backend with Stripe integration. Built for performance and scalability across iOS and Android.
features: Navigation, state management, and UI components

name: SaaS Starter Kit (Mobile) - MongoDB + Supabase Auth
description: Launch mobile apps faster with this React Native + Node/Express + MongoDB + Supabase starter.
longDescription: Includes React Native Expo for UI, Supabase for secure auth, and a custom Express.js server with MongoDB support. Stripe billing is pre-integrated for subscriptions. Ideal for mobile-first SaaS platforms.

name: Side Project Starter Kit (Web) - Supabase
description: Next.js + Supabase stack to launch side projects quickly and securely.
longDescription: This kit is designed for side project builders who want to focus on features, not setup. It comes with Supabase authentication, database, and easy deployment options.

name: Side Project Starter Kit (Web) - Clerk + Supabase/Mongo
description: Combine Clerk authentication with your preferred database for fast web development.
longDescription: Choose between Supabase or MongoDB depending on your needs. This flexible starter kit works perfectly for solo developers launching MVPs or prototypes.
features: Built-in protected routes and user sessions

name: Side Project Starter Kit (Mobile) - Supabase
description: Lightweight React Native Expo starter kit with Supabase auth and secure database access.
longDescription: Perfect for indie devs and students, this mobile starter kit uses Supabase auth and database with row-level security. Easily expandable and optimized for rapid development.
features: React Native Expo with Supabase integration
Ideal for learning and small launches
